title: [Item Concept] - Tempo Attack
body:
+70AP
+30 Armor
+30% Attack Speed

UNIQUE: Autoattacking an enemy champion 2 times increases your **Armor by 10, your AS by 35%, and gives you 10% crit reduction** for the next 10 seconds (20 second cooldown)

Price: 2900

Build Path: {{item:3191}} + {{item:1043}} +{{item:1026}} 

_________________________________________

Very niche item but this could balance out champions like azir and diana without direct buffs & may even be used by champs with AA procs like Ekko who can benifit from the bonus armor.

replies.body: I feel like this item alone could solve the AD class domination over the AP class.
Wait wait, you really think that Azir need buffs?
The only issue is {{item:1043}} has on-hit damage and your item doesn't.  Maybe make it just 2 daggers instead?
